name: openai-monorepo
description: Fullstack monorepo with OpenAI chat backend and React frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,admin -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "pnpm --filter admin dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter admin build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter admin lint
